channel.title: Ip banning = useless?
channel.description:
hello well i noticed that ip banning is quite useless because i have been ip banned on a server befor and i found all you have to do is ether shut down ur computer then restart your computer and then ur not ip banned any more because somthing happend to your ip or you can just start up your dsl or wat ever and wala you can go back on the server but seriously is ip banning useless when they can still get back on your server pretty easly? why not just shut down your server for 5minutes then starting your server back up or muting the offender but going for the trouble to ip bann some one its useless when u can use more affective methods. ;D
p.s this topic has been made in the wrong section it will now be here.

item.title: Ip banning = useless?
item.dc:creator: @Paintball199 Paintball199
item.description:
@Paintball199 wrote:

lol Idc. then i mute them or most time i kick them at the Starter Location.
( Right Click Kick ) Do it Everytime and their Client crash. use Autotalker
::kick (playerName)
